title: Bug 49195: Error message when using port 1 for shutdown with Windows service
description: When specifying <Server port="1" in server.xml, there is an error message being printed when stopping the Tomcat service. This behavior can be improved. It is also mentioned that jsvc may show similar behavior.
OB: When stopping the Tomcat service with port 1 for shutdown, an error message is printed.
EB: When stopping the Tomcat service with port 1 for shutdown, the error message should not be printed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Install Tomcat as a service on Windows.
2. Start the service.
3. Stop the service.
4. Shutdown the server through OS signal by calling Catalina.stop().
